title: Generate a Farm Sustainability Report
description: A farm that supplies a major food brand needs to generate an annual sustainability report covering its water usage, carbon footprint, and biodiversity practices.

tasks.description: Retrieve the farm's total water usage for the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the water usage data.

tasks.description: Calculate the farm's carbon footprint based on fuel usage, fertilizer inputs, and tillage practices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total CO2 equivalent emissions.

tasks.description: Retrieve records of biodiversity-promoting activities, such as planting pollinator habitats or cover crops.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the relevant practice records.

tasks.description: Compile all the data into a formatted sustainability report based on the food brand's template.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete, professional report.
